Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

 Playing KSP again and noticed in map view I am seeing offered mission orbits even though have not accepted the missions. I have turned off offered orbits in tracking station view but the offered mission orbits still remain in map view. 

Anyway to disable offered mission orbits in map view?

Is one of my mods causing this bug or does stock do this also?

 

Nevermind: Seems to be caused by Research Bodies mod bug. These were were not offered missions, rather active Research Bodies missions in progress. The bug part is that Research Bodies doesn't have an exact orbit, rather just 200,000+. Diagnosed had to be Research Bodies because that was only missions offered or active by the RepoSoft company displayed on orbit mouse hover.

Edited November 8, 2021 by fragtzack
discovered issue
Definitely stock. Don't know how to turn them off, so far I only had at most a couple at a time, a minor annoyance.
